comment: If ` F ` is an epimorphism and ` F ` is a section of ` G ` , then ` G ` is an inverse of ` F ` and they are both isomorphisms. This is also stated as "an epimorphism which is also a split monomorphism is an isomorphism". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
